nodes.text: Psychokinetic attack was a Ta-Ree spell capable of being wielded by Ascendants on the planet Kathol. The spell allowed the caster to launch a psychokinetic attack that could injure or even kill a target. The method or injuring or killing was varied, and could include collapsing the trachea, stirring the brain, or squeezing the heart.
Ascendants who wished to cast the spell were required to know the block pain, deadly touch, inflict pain, sense life, and psychokinesis spells.
